structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Continuation of board's jurisdiction -- Notification to local officials of license sanctions.

text.section: The revocation, suspension, restriction, lapse, or voluntary surrender of a license or certificate issued by the board shall not deprive the board of jurisdiction to investigate allegations of wrongdoing under KRS 198B.650 to 198B.689 or conduct disciplinary proceedings against a licensee or certificate holder.

The board shall, within thirty (30) days of the action, notify all appropriate local building officials, permit offices, or other authorized persons of license and certificate revocations, suspensions, probations, restrictions, and restorations.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1994.
